title: The definitive guide to account takeover fraud
description: Explore the landscape of cybersecurity threats with Keyless' guide, "ATO Fraud: The Definitive Guide." In today's digital era, where account takeover fraud constitutes a substantial 33% of global fraud cases, this white paper serves as your key to understanding the nuances of this prevalent threat. Within the guide, we explore: - Common techniques fraudsters use to execute an account takeover attack, such as phishing and credential stuffing. - Consequences, including financial losses and identity theft. - Key access points, such as usernames, passwords, mobile numbers, and email accounts. - Factors fueling the rise in attacks, including data breaches, weak authentication protocols, an

title: Facial access control: Buyer’s guide
description: Ensuring the physical security of your business or organization has never been more vital. With traditional access control methods facing increasing scrutiny for their inefficiency and susceptibility to breaches, it's time to explore the future of access control. Innovative solutions have become indispensable, and facial biometrics has emerged as a gamechanging technology with the potential to revolutionize security and comprehensively address these pressing issues. This buyer's guide by Veridas covers challenges and solutions, key selection criteria and a comparison table of suppliers.

title: Voice biometric authentication: Buyer’s guide
description: This buyer's guide by Veridas aims to assist in navigating the vast landscape of voice biometric authentication solutions, highlighting key factors you should consider when choosing a provider. The guide covers challenges and solutions, key selection criteria and a comparison table of suppliers. It explores what you should consider when choosing among different voice biometric authentication solutions.
